pkgmetadata.longdescription: # CharredVery simple package with `is_ascii_char`, `is_same_char`, `is_string`, `is_unicode_char` and `repeat_char` methods.I will probably add more later.Install package:```pip install charred# or pip3```Usage:```from charred import is_ascii_char, is_same_char, is_string, is_unicode_char, repeat_char>>> is_ascii_char('$')True>>> is_ascii_char('£')False>>> is_same_char('FF')True>>> is_same_char('FD')False>>> is_string('F')True>>> is_string(1)False>>> is_unicode_char('£')True>>> is_unicode_char('F')False>>> repeat_char('F', 6)FFFFFF```
